definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: Stainless steel polished tank with filter imbedded in, which is good-looking.

sentences.english: The press employs all the steel- sheet welded structure frame, featuring good appearance and excellent rigidity.

sentences.english: Good ductility of aluminum foil, can do a variety of styles of lunch boxes, beautiful and clear Cool.

sentences.english: The use of complementary colors is an important aspect of aesthetically pleasing art and graphic design.
sentences.chinese: 使用互补色是美观的艺术设计和平面设计的重要手段。

sentences.english: It will make a pretty side table for your deck.

sentences.english: Suppose someone gave you a pen – a sealed, solid-colored pen.
sentences.chinese: 如不美观有人送你一支笔，一支不构怨卸的单色钢笔。

sentences.english: Proper use of white space can also add to the attractiveness and legibility of your warranty.
sentences.chinese: 适当使用空白，也可以使保修书美观和易读。

definition: according to a pattern/regular/orderly/structured/neat and tidy
exterior appearance/to view sth from the outside/exterior condition
